numericalExperiment.rationale: Extended future projection (2006-2300) forced by RCP8.5. RCP8.5 is a representative concentration pathway which approximately results in a radiative forcing of 8.5 W m-2 at year 2100, relative to pre-industrial conditions. RCPs are time-dependent, consistent projections of emissions and concentrations of radiatively active gases and particles

numericalRequirement.name: 4.2L.ic
numericalRequirement.description: Initial conditions are from the end of experiment 3.2_historical

numericalRequirement.name: 4.2L.bc.wmg.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP8.5 well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 4.2L.bc.sls.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP8.5 short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 4.2L.bc.aer.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP8.5 aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 4.2L.bc.aer_pre.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of RCP8.5 aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 4.2L.bc.wmg.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP8.5 well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 4.2L.bc.sls.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP8.5 short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 4.2L.bc.aer.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP8.5 aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 4.2L.bc.aer_pre.em
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing emissions of RCP8.5 aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 4.2L.bc.aer_volc.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed constant background volcanic aerosol may (or may not) be specified
